page.title: 04Home Life.
page.content: {A Day in Julie's Life.} When I get up I dress myself, wash myself and brush my teeth. I get my school bag ready then I eat my breakfast. I usually have cereal or toast. Then I brush my hair and go to school. I go in a car to school. School starts at half past nine. We do spelling and mental arithmetic which are both tests. We have an interval at twenty to eleven. Then we do Maths and English. We have our dinner at quarter to one, then we go outside to play. We have teachers who visit us through the week to teach us art, knitting, music and physical education. We have a computer that we play games on and do projects. We go home from school at half past three by car. When I get home I watch Childrens' Television, which is a lot of programmes for children.
